I like to code and I usually do it in JavaScript. I am a CS graduate with a passion for web development having 4+ years of professional experience working with clients or building in-house projects.

In my free time, I like to travel and meet new people. I enjoy spending time in nature, being it hiking or just hanging out with friends on a walk.
